channel.title: CVE Feed for aweber -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aweber -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47757|2024-08-28T14:36:43.297Z -- aweber -- aweber%20%E2%80%93%20free%20sign%20up%20form%20and%20landing%20page%20builder%20plugin%20for%20lead%20generation%20and%20email%20newsletter%20growth
item.description: Missing Authorization, Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AWeber AWeber – Free Sign Up Form and Landing Page Builder Plugin for Lead Generation and Email Newsletter Growth allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs, Cross-Site Request Forgery.This issue affects AWeber – Free Sign Up Form and Landing Page Builder Plugin for Lead Generation and Email Newsletter Growth: from n/a through 7.3.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-1793|2024-08-09T20:31:45.793Z -- aweber -- aweber%20%E2%80%93%20free%20sign%20up%20form%20and%20landing%20page%20builder%20plugin%20for%20lead%20generation%20and%20email%20newsletter%20growth
item.description: The AWeber – Free Sign Up Form and Landing Page Builder Plugin for Lead Generation and Email Newsletter Growth plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'post_id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 7.3.14 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-1793|2024-03-13T15:27:24.266Z -- aweber -- aweber%20%E2%80%93%20free%20sign%20up%20form%20and%20landing%20page%20builder%20plugin%20for%20lead%20generation%20and%20email%20newsletter%20growth

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
